Example

Write out the possible permutations of the letters \(A, B, C\) and \(D\).

Solution

The possible permutations are \[\begin{matrix}ABCD& ABDC& ADBC& ADCB &ACBD& ACDB\\ BADC& BACD& BCDA& BCAD& BDAC& BDCA\\ CABD& CADB& CDBA& CDAB& CBAD& CBDA\\ DABC& DACB& DCAB& DCBA& DBAC& DBCA \end{matrix}\] There are \(4!=24\) permutations of the four letters \(A, B, C\) and \(D\).
